Pre-Game Insights: Riding the euphoria of a 7-5 comeback win in extra innings on Thursday, the Guardians look to extend the American League Championship series and guarantee a return to New York when they face the Yankees in Game 4.
The game will be held at Progressive Field at 8:08 p.m. ET.
The starting pitchers for the game are RHP Gavin Williams for the Guardians and RHP Luis Gil for the Yankees.
